name: Browsersynclearningroadmap
body:
Welcome to Browser-sync!

Starting Stylus watch and Browser-sync on Static Server

Stylus and Browser-sync:

Starting Stylus watch and Browser-sync on Static Server
stylus -w foldername

browser-sync start --proxy "testweb.dev" --files "*.php, css/*.css, js/*.js"

Starting Stylus watch and Browser-sync on Static Server

stylus -w foldername
browser-sync start --server --files "css/*.css, js/*.js, *.html"

browser-sync start --proxy "mydrupalsite.dev" --files "themes/bartik/css/*.css"
browser-sync start --server --files "css/*.css"

// single file
files: "app/css/style.css"

// multiple files
files: ["app/css/style.css", "app/css/ie.css"]

// watch all files under app/css (including sub directories)
files: "app/css/**"

// multiple globs
files: ["app/css/*.css", "app/**.*.html", "app/js/**/*.js"]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
